div.p: Number of individuals ( a) and occasions ( b) of interceptions of the European goldfinch ( Carduelis carduelis) by authorities in Algeria. The yellow arrow indicates the direction of European goldfinch exportation for international trading. Algeria is divided into administrative provinces. The map was made with MapInfo Professional software (version 15.0, http://www.pitneybowes.com/us/location-intelligence/geographic-information-systems/mapinfo-pro.html).
